Instruction: Preheat oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Lightly grease a 9-inch pie or cake pan.
Combine flour, milk, eggs, melted butter, and salt in a large bowl until smooth. Pour the batter into the prepared pan.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 325 degrees F and bake for an additional 5 minutes. Serve hot.
